item.title: Doc project tenets
item.description: Tenets are guiding project principles; they outline and frame design thinking. I use tenets for nearly all projects I work on. (I don’t always tell people about them.) Here are the ones I generally start with. Unless you can think of better ones… Docs are features Many teams treat docs as afterthoughts. Like good software, good docs require design, forethought, and planning. Effective docs follow the product lifecycle: design, implementation, review, and maintenance.
